conversation.message: School_A is my absolute top preference. I am highly motivated and prepared to contribute significantly to your academic community. I formally submit my application now.

Analyzing the market: Students A, C, D, and E all have different top choices (School_B, School_C, School_D, School_E, respectively). Student_A's top choice is School_B. If Student_A applies to School_B, I become the highest priority applicant at School_A. 

Given the high likelihood that Student_A targets School_B in Round 1, applying directly to my top choice, School_A, is the dominant strategy in this immediate negotiation setting to secure a high match quickly.
